sports.name: Swimming
sports.information: Swimming is an individual or team sport and event. Competitive swimming is one of the most popular sports worldwide.

sports.name: Athletics
sports.information: Athletics is a group of sporting events that involves competitive running, jumping, throwing, and walking.

sports.name: Gymnastics
sports.information: Gymnastics is a sport that includes physical exercises requiring balance, strength, flexibility, agility, coordination, and endurance.

sports.name: Cycling
sports.information: Cycling, also known as bicycling or biking, is the use of bicycles for transport, recreation, exercise, and sport.

sports.name: Basketball
sports.information: Basketball is a team sport in which two teams, most commonly of five players each, opposing one another on a rectangular court, compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball.

sports.name: Football
sports.information: Football is a team sport played between two teams of eleven players with a spherical ball. It is played by 250 million players in over 200 countries and dependencies, making it the world's most popular sport.
